description: This file defines the Controller class for a TodoMVC application, managing interactions between the model and view components, handling user events, and updating the UI accordingly.

classes.name: Controller
classes.description: A class that acts as the intermediary between the model and view, managing todo item operations and UI updates.

methods.name: setView
methods.description: Loads and initializes the view based on the URL hash, updating the filter state.

methods.name: showActive
methods.description: Displays only active (not completed) todo items.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with the given title.

methods.name: editItem
methods.description: Enters editing mode for a specific item.

methods.name: editItemSave
methods.description: Saves changes to an item or removes it if the title is empty.

methods.name: editItemCancel
methods.description: Cancels editing mode for a specific item.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes a specific item from storage and UI.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of an item.

methods.name: _updateCount
methods.description: Updates UI elements showing the count of active and completed todos.

methods.name: _filter
methods.description: Re-filters todo items based on the current route.

methods.name: _updateFilterState
methods.description: Updates the filter navigation state based on the current page.
